Tool:          LibXML2
Last Updated:  January 10 2018
Last Built:    January 10 2018
Version:       2.9.7

Notes:
 - Download: http://xmlsoft.org/downloads.html

 - Need to copy inconv.h to include directory
 - Need to copy binaries of libinconv to lib directory
 - Run commands for Debug and Release:	
   cscript configure.js compiler=msvc prefix=<prefix>\3rdParty\LibXML2\Src\win32\Debug include=<prefix>\3rdParty\LibXML2\Src\include lib=<prefix>\3rdParty\LibXML2\Src\lib cruntime=/MDd debug=yes
   mv Makefile MakefileDbg
   cscript configure.js compiler=msvc prefix=<prefix>\3rdParty\LibXML2\Src\win32\Release include=<prefix>\3rdParty\LibXML2\Src\include lib=<prefix>\3rdParty\LibXML2\Src\lib cruntime=/MD debug=no
   mv Makefile MakefileRel
 - In Makefile add extension _x64 and x64_d for the library and modify iconv.lib to libiconv_x64/x64_d.lib
 - In Makefile add Debug\ to the BINDIR, XML_INTDIR, XML_INTDIR_A, XML_INTDIR_A_DLL, UTILS_INTDIR
 - Copy libxml2.def.src and change names to match Makefile (libxml2_x64_d.def.src, etc...)
 - Run command to compile
   nmake.exe /f MakefileRel install
   nmake.exe /f MakefileDbg install
